gadget.definition: An unusual device that serves a practical utility.
examples: He wouldn't stop fiddling with his gizmos and gadgets.

game.definition: A type of game or sport, usually bound by certain rules.
examples: Why don't we play a game?
My car ran out of gas, and now I'm stranded on the freeway.

gas.definition: A state where matter will fill a container with no fixed volume or shape.
examples: I left my water on the stove too long and it turned into gas.

gassy.definition: Used to describe a person or animal that farts a lot.

gay.definition: Used to describe someone, usually a male, who is homosexual.

google.definition: To search on the web using the Google search engine.
examples: I Google things. You ChatGPT them. We are not the same.
